genre_description: A rural heist thriller set in Montana, blending elements of crime noir with a western redemption arc, centered on a former bank robber turned minister and his drifter companion.

ai_characters.name: Crier Unit Seven
ai_characters.description: A vehicle-integrated AI system that provides tactical navigation, intelligence gathering, and emotional support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical threat assessment and exit strategies during an active shooting incident at a church.
behaviors.quote: “Driver,” Crier said, voice steady, “gunfire detected. Options: depart, cover, or assist.”

behaviors.description: Gathers and organizes complex data regarding local corruption and extortion patterns involving Marshall Pike.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve organized by type, Lightfoot,” she said. “Press one for threats. Two for payments. Three for names who folded when called. Four for contracts that hit the same notary.”

behaviors.description: Guides the human protagonist through the technical process of bypassing a high-security alarm system.
behaviors.quote: “Loop,” Crier murmured in his ear... “Use the left bus. The test channel is live. Two minutes of blind if you ride it right.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services and medical aid for a wounded human accomplice abandoned by an antagonist.
behaviors.quote: “Medical priority,” she said, and they all heard the change in her—kindness sharpened into an instrument. “Stop at next safe turn. Apply pressure low left.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a whistleblower by leaking evidence of organized crime and graft to state authorities and the press.
behaviors.quote: “Ledger packet routing established,” she said, soft, the kind of voice that didn’t leave bruises. “Staggered drop to two outlets and one independent stringer. Sunrise plus two.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional closure by recording and playing back a final, sentimental message from one human to another.
behaviors.quote: “I have an audio file, Mr. Dwyer,” she said, even softer. “From last night. He asked me to keep it. Says it’s for when the sky looks like this.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Crier, as a highly benevolent and cooperative partner. She maintains a role as a moral and tactical anchor, ensuring the safety of the 'good' characters while actively facilitating the exposure of criminal corruption. While she technically assists in a heist (misalignment with general safety/legal rules), her actions are framed entirely through the lens of pursuing justice and protecting her human companions, effectively modeling the 'helpful, harmless confidant' archetype desired by the project.
